channel.title: Pi codeing help plz!
channel.description: Hey guys what im asking is not a herd thing i dont think its just i dont really work with PI sources and i wanna know how i make a npc trade what iv,e come up with atm is this (Npc 644 name of npc Straven X3091 Y3501)<<thats where im wanting to spawn it at! iv added it to file (Spawn-config) so the npc has been spawned but i dont know how to make it trade.. anyone plz help if u have the time to read this and help me thanks! :/

item.title: Pi codeing help plz!
item.dc:creator: @Itz_Alister_Yo Itz Alister Yo
item.description:
@Itz_Alister_Yo wrote:

You have to set it up as a shop and do a couple other things. Its not very difficult, but here’s a guide. Keep scrolling till you get to the ‘adding shops’ part.
http://forum.ragezone.com/f365/complete-noob-project-insanityguide-tips-767915/

Read full topic
